execution_quality: The agent received an incomplete request that was truncated mid-specification and did not attempt to clarify or request the complete categorization criteria.
work_category: Email categorization task requesting the agent to classify a batch of emails into predefined categories (read, keep, delete).
summary: The agent received a truncated task specification and did not proactively request the complete categorization criteria before attempting work. The session ended without any email processing, indicating the task was interrupted or abandoned.
follow_up_pattern: Session ended without user providing additional input, suggesting either accidental termination during incomplete request submission or user moving to a different task.
